pages.text: $(l)$(earth)Amulet of Jump-Boost$() - is one of the $(o)'advanced'$() amulets. It's made by combining $(l:elementalamulets:amulets/air_amulet)Amulet of Air$() with slime and rabbit feet$(br2)$(l)USAGE$(): $(li)Allows you to jump higher! Increases with higher tier
Tier 1:$(li)allows you to jump to the height of 3 blocks
Tier 2:$(li)allows you to jump to the height of 6 blocks
Tier 3:$(li)allows you to jump to the height of 9 blocks
Tier 4:$(li)Allows you to jump to the height of 12 blocks$(br2)$(l)NOTE: These values may not be accurate if configuration was changed! I'm thinking about the fix
